tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sustainability_efforts (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  city VARCHAR(50),
  strategy_name VARCHAR(50),
  effectiveness DECIMAL,
  budget DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE recycling_centers (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  capacity INT,
  waste_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE waste_collection (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  collection_date DATE,
  weight DECIMAL(10,2),
  center_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (center_id) REFERENCES recycling_centers(id)
)

CREATE TABLE waste_diversion_strategies (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  strategy_name VARCHAR(100),
  description TEXT,
  effectiveness DECIMAL(5,2)
)

CREATE TABLE sustainability_metrics (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  metric_name VARCHAR(100),
  value DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE waste_pickup_schedule (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  day VARCHAR(15),
  frequency VARCHAR(15),
  center_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (center_id) REFERENCES recycling_centers(id)
)
